text: @realDonaldTrump If the virus is no longer a threat, why are you requiring COVID-19 liability waivers for those that will attend future MAGA Rallies?  Will you require the same, or similar, COVID-19 liability waiver for those attending the Republican Convention?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
